'''The Ravencoat''' was a [[Heralds (local)|local office]] of the [[Heralds of Faerûn]], based in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]] and performing Herald duties there. This heraldic office was folded into the civic official position of the [[Regent of City Works]].

As a herald, The Ravencoat was entitled to a maroon-and-gold [[tabard]] adorned with black wings, as well as a trumpet.
